title: nAdrudru dIm (thillAnA)
sahitya:
nAdhrudhru dhImdhIm tanadhiranAtadara tAni tOmdhrudhru dhImdhIm tanana

anupallavi

 nAdhrudAni tomdhrudAni tanOm tanadhirana tadaradAni dhrudhru dhIm tananam
jhamtarikiTataka NamtarikiTataka takaNaka takajhaNu dhimitari kiTataka
garinidani magArisani pAdani

caraNam

 vitaraNa guNa shIla su-paNDita gAyakasamAja kavi janApta
 su-hrdaya vijayashrI ugrapANDya dhIrA kavita janAdhAra sukumAra
